Title: roundToExp2
Description: Accepts a number. If the number is less than one, it returns 0. Otherwise, it rounds the number down to the nearest (whole non-negative) degree of two.
num: A number to round. UInt/Float.
0, for num <1\lt 1<1. UInt8.num rounded down to the nearest (whole non-negative) degree of two. UInt/Float equivalent to the input type.
Examples: SELECT *, roundToExp2(*) FROM system.numbers WHERE number IN (0, 2, 5, 10, 19, 50)
